title: Efficient JavaScript Charting with Tree-Based Scene Graphs
description: Learn how AG Charts leverages a tree-based scene graph abstraction to efficiently render complex JavaScript charts.

title: Whats New in AG Grid 32
description: What's New in AG Grid 32 - Rich Select Editor Multi Select, 15% Reduced Bundle Size, Localisation in 20+ languages, and more

title: What's New in AG Charts 10
description: What's New in AG Charts 10 - Financial Charts, Sankey & Chord Series, Smooth & Step Line Styles, and Localisation in 20+ languages

title: Introducing Our New Theming API
description: Learn more about the Theming API: The new, easy way to create and customise themes for AG Grid, directly from your JavaScript code.
